price: 59. Ils dirent : « Qui donc a fait cela de nos divinités, ce doit être quelqu’un d’injuste ! »
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
